TECH_POS.text: The wait time for order processing took no more than a minute in your service. Great!

TECH_NEG.text: The app keeps crashing whenever I try to use the main features. This is really frustrating.

TECH_NEUT.text: I noticed that the app sometimes takes a few seconds to load, but it's still usable.

PAY_POS.text: The payment system is really smooth and secure. I appreciate the clear transaction history.

PAY_NEG.text: I've been trying to make a payment for hours but it keeps failing. This is unacceptable.

PAY_NEUT.text: Payment is straightforward, although it would be better if the checks were more detailed.

OTHER_POS.text: The customer support team is really helpful and responsive. They solved my issue quickly.

OTHER_NEG.text: Your customer service team is full of boorish people!

OTHER_NEUT.text: Your tech support helped solve the problem, but could have responded faster.
